title: Jan-Philip Uhlemann
text:
I am an agricultural economist. I expecting to complete my PhD at Wageningen University and Research in 2025.
My research interest lie in agricultural economics, innovation economics and econometrics. My PhD focuses on economics of innovation and sustainability in the food processing sector.
I received a BSc in Nutrition and Food Science from Bonn University in 2019 and a MSc in Agricultural Economics from Humboldt University in 2021.
Email: uhlemannjp [ at ] gmail [ dot ] com

title: Research
text:
My research code can be found on github.
